revised_title: Case Study: Successful Treatment of a Rare Stomach Impostume
tldr: This article presents a case study of a young lady who had an extraordinary impostume formed in her stomach. The patient was treated with a combination of cooling mucilaginous mixtures, sperma ceti, laxative glysters, and mutton broth injections. The impostume eventually suppurated, digested, and cicatrized, and the patient was nourished solely by mutton broth glysters during the treatment process.
